text: I’ve been a patient of NUH since I was 2 years old. Had my transplant back in 2019 and everything has gone smoothly. From the admin to the nurses to the doctors, they’ve been amazing. They really take good care of you. I would recommend someone who is interested in the transplant journey to be referred here.

The center is really bad, doctors are no experienced at all ,please don’t come to the NUHCOT!!!!! The doctor at NUCOT force patient Go to the expense ward, without ask the patient and force the patient stay there longer to pay more money
